title: 046 - Kenn Kington - Hearts, Butter and Brasil Nuts
description:
Kenn Kington is back, and he’s ready to roll. This week on Poddy Break, Tim professes his love of dimmers. Freight reprimands Tim for digging his fingers in the nut jar. Kenn is a walking miracle. Tim and Kenn talk about joke thieves. And, CALEB FINDS THE FOAMY THING!!!Also on this episode: Tim gives his kids 200 oz of Mr. Pibb. We meet Taylor Swift’s sisters. Kenn’s heart calls into the show. Caleb and Josh get Freight to load the trailer. And, Luke Bryan sings the national anthem!Get your Poddy Break Merch! Click Here!!!!Follow us @poddybreakEmail us at poddybreak@rockshowcomedy.com  Click here  to see Tim LIVE!!!Get more of Kenn at kennkington.comTweet Kenn @kennkington
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: Tim Hawkins
itunes:subtitle: You're digging your fingers in there like a monkey...

content:encoded:
Kenn Kington is back, and he’s ready to roll. This week on Poddy Break, Tim professes his love of dimmers. Freight reprimands Tim for digging his fingers in the nut jar. Kenn is a walking miracle. Tim and Kenn talk about joke thieves. And, CALEB FINDS THE FOAMY THING!!!

Also on this episode: Tim gives his kids 200 oz of Mr. Pibb. We meet Taylor Swift’s sisters. Kenn’s heart calls into the show. Caleb and Josh get Freight to load the trailer. And, Luke Bryan sings the national anthem!
